item.title: Ansible 批量生成并服务器密码
item.author: Ryan
item.description: 生成密码的 Bash 脚本： #!/bin/bash #Maintainer： Zhangxinxin #Email: xx9z@outlook.com #Time: 2023.10 password="XXXXX$(ifconfig | awk '/ether/{print $2}' | md5sum | cut -b -6)" host=$(ifconfig | awk -F'[: ]+' '/inet /{print $3}' | sed '2d') user=root timestamp=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") if echo "$user:$password" | chpasswd; then success_message="[$timestamp] 当前主机: $host, 账号: $user,
